projects.title: Shopify Discount Functions Testing App
details: Internal tool developed to assist colleagues in testing and tophatting Shopify Discount Function logic.
Deployed to prod for internal use with reliable CI/CD pipeline using Google Cloud Platform and Github Actions.

projects.title: Shopify Flow App A/B Test
details: Led the development of an A/B test for Shopify Flow's template UI experience with the goal of increasing conversion rate.
Implemented tracking and analysis tools to measure the success of the A/B test.

projects.title: Shopify Admin Shopify Shipping Sell Page
details: Top contributor in a fast-paced environment, collaborating effectively with Marketing UX team to deliver successful outcomes.
Implement various cases of logic that depends on GraphQL API in React TypeScript Framework.
Constant research into API documentation involved, to better grasp the vastness of multiple integrations.
Received positive feedback from multiple Senior Shopifolk Developers for personal contributions.

projects.title: FreeFlow Social Network
details: Developed a game-based social network connecting users based on their unique needs, assets, and skills.
Executed a comprehensive front-end project migration and rebuild from Gatsby UI to React with Redux Toolkit.
Developed multiple Redux Toolkit state management modules, showcasing proficiency with entityAdapter and async 'thunks'.
Acquired and applied knowledge of Redux Toolkit through self-taught study and prior understanding of reducer concepts.
